TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Principal extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class Principal Implements IDisposable
public ref class Principal abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 封裝所有安全性主體共通的帳戶資料和作業。

span.span: Encapsulates the account data and operations common to all security principals.

summary.span: 這是所有安全性主體都衍生自的抽象基底類別。

span.span: This is the abstract base class from which all security principals are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自這個類別的自訂延伸模組類別可以呼叫這個建構函式，從衍生的類別建構函式來初始化基底類別。Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 主體擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概觀主題。For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

span.span: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended to be called directly from your code.

summary.span: 傳回群組物件的集合，指定目前的主體是哪些群組的成員。

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載的方法只會傳回主體是哪些直接成員的群組不執行任何遞迴搜尋。This overloaded method only returns the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. 遞迴搜尋結果可供使用者主體物件。Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. 如果主體存放區是 AD DS，群組的清單會包含使用者的主要群組識別碼屬性，在 AD DS 物件中所指定的主要群組。If the principal store is AD DS, the list of groups contains the user's primary group that is identified by the primary group ID attribute in the AD DS object.

span.span: System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups() cil managed
Public Function GetGroups () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

summary.span: 傳回群組物件的集合，指定目前的主體是哪些群組的成員。

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

returns.span: 物件的集合，指定目前的主體是哪些群組的成員。

span.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會傳回群組的主體直接為成員;不執行任何遞迴搜尋。This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. 遞迴搜尋結果可供使用者主體物件。Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. 這個方法所傳回的群組可能包含來自不同的範圍和儲存在主體的群組。The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. 例如，如果主體是具有 DN 的 AD DS 物件"CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com，傳回的集合可以包含屬於群組"CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com。For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com. 如果目前的主體是 AD DS 主體，傳回的群組會包含主體的主要群組，在 AD DS 物件上的 「 primaryGroupId"屬性所指示。If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group, as indicated by the "primaryGroupId" attribute on the AD DS object.

span.span: System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext contextToQuery) cil managed
Public Function GetGroups (contextToQuery As PrincipalContext) As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

param.name: contextToQuery
param.span: 物件，指定要執行查詢的內容。

span.span: The object that specifies the context against which the query is performed.

param.span: 當內容位於其他網域時，會對主體物件在所指定內容中的表示執行查詢。

span.span: When the context is located in another domain, the query is performed against the principal objects' representation in the specified context.

summary.span: 傳回群組物件的集合，這些群組物件代表的群組不但是主體所屬的群組，而且存在於指定之內容參數所提供的存放區內。

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that the principal is a member of and that exist in the store provided by the specified context parameter.

returns.span: 物件的集合，指定目前的主體是哪些群組的成員。

span.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會傳回群組的主體直接為成員;不執行任何遞迴搜尋。This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. 遞迴搜尋結果可供使用者主體物件。Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. 這個方法所傳回的群組可能包含來自不同的範圍和儲存在主體的群組。The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. 例如，如果主體是具有 DN 的 AD DS 物件"CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com，傳回的集合可以包含屬於群組"CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com。For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com. 如果目前的主體是 AD DS 主體，傳回的群組的 AD DS 物件的主要群組識別碼屬性所指定，就會包含主體的主要群組。If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性一律會傳回 null 時屬性設定為機器。This property will always return null when the property is set to Machine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: 針對執行的作業指定伺服器或網域的 。

span.span: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

summary.span: 將在主體物件上所做的變更儲存至存放區。

span.span: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store.

summary.span: 如果這是新的主體物件，則這個方法會將其插入至指定的內容。

span.span: If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the specified context.

summary.span: 如果已保存主體，則會從原始內容移至指定的內容。

span.span: If the principal has already been persisted, it is moved from the original context to the specified context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的主體內容不同於現有的內容，主體會移至指定的內容，且主體的物件不再位於舊的位置。If the specified principal context differs from the existing context, the principal is moved to the specified context, and the principal object no longer is located in the old location. 如果指定的內容是相同的現有內容，此方法會儲存至存放區在主體物件上所做的更新。If the specified context is identical to the existing context, this method saves the updates that were made on the principal object to the store. 指定內容的內容型別必須是目前的內容型別相同的型別。The context type of the specified context must be the same type as the current context type. 使用電腦內容型別時，可能不呼叫這個方法。This method may not be called by using the computer context type.

exception.span: 主體尚未與 物件產生關聯。

span.span: The principal has not yet been associated with a object.

exception.span: 這個型別的主體無法插入至存放區。

span.span: This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.

exception.span: 將變更儲存至存放區，或更新存放區中的群組成員資格時發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred when saving changes to the store, or updating the group membership in the store.

exception.span: 主體已在存放區中。

span.span: The principal already occurs in the store.

exception.span: 密碼不符合複雜度要求。

span.span: The password does not meet complexity requirements.
